titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Hoosiers of Indiana University for winning the 2018 Women's National Invitation Tournament.
A resolution congratulating the Hoosiers of Indiana University for winning the 2018 Women's National Invitation Tournament.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Indiana University women's basketball team for the team's performance in the 2018 Women's National Invitation Tournament.
